content: have the picots  the final seam is an easy whip stitch where the final end is stitched back to the starting fdc or starting chain plus single_crochet  you have the option of making the cowl by crocheting a total of 12 repeats of the four-row repeat or you can add on more of the four-row repeats for an infinity scarf because the cowl is crocheted from end to end it s easy to modify the circumference you can try it on to determine your perfect stopping point start crocheting after the set up row you will crochet row 1 then repeat row 2-5 for a total of 12 times when you reach the specified length you will seam the two ends together i recommend wet blocking the cowl to give it shape and easy instructions are included set up crochet a fsc row of 36 stitches or chain 37 turn and
